issue.title: Modifications to example team docker image

content.raw:
Also, note that the current example container image publishes to the old ROS topic for thrusters:

```
root        29  0.1  0.1 410568 55308 ?        Sl   20:18   0:00 /usr/bin/python2 /opt/ros/melodic/bin/rostopic pub /left_thrust_cmd std_msgs/Float32 -r 1 -- 2
root        30  0.1  0.1 336836 55216 ?        Sl   20:18   0:00 /usr/bin/python2 /opt/ros/melodic/bin/rostopic pub /right_thrust_cmd std_msgs/Float32 -r 1 -- 2
```

So this doesn’t connect with the existing wam-v to be able to move the vessel.
content.html:

root        29  0.1  0.1 410568 55308 ?        Sl   20:18   0:00 /usr/bin/python2 /opt/ros/melodic/bin/rostopic pub /left_thrust_cmd std_msgs/Float32 -r 1 -- 2
root        30  0.1  0.1 336836 55216 ?        Sl   20:18   0:00 /usr/bin/python2 /opt/ros/melodic/bin/rostopic pub /right_thrust_cmd std_msgs/Float32 -r 1 -- 2

So this doesn’t connect with the existing wam-v to be able to move the vessel.
